def mongo_query(letter, age):
    return {'': [{'name': {'$regex': letter}}, {'age': {'$gt': age}}]}

def mongo_query(letter, age):
    return {'$and': [{'': {'$regex': letter}}, {'age': {'$gt': age}}]}

def mongo_query(letter, age):
    return {'$and': [{'name': {'$regex': letter}}, {'': {'$gt': age}}]}

def mongo_query(letter, age):
    return {'$and': [{'name': {'': letter}}, {'age': {'$gt': age}}]}

def mongo_query(letter, age):
    return {'$and': [{'name': {'$regex': letter}}, {'age': {'': age}}]}
